name: Pokémon Alternate Evolutions
overview: Pokémon: • 272 Pokémon from Gen 1 to 5 • Many Pokémon have different evolutions • Pokémon have revised BST and Movesets • Some Pokémon have new abilites • A lot of typing changes • Starters are Chikorita, Charmander and Squirtle • Pokémon you can buy from the Game Corner are different Features: • All trainers have edited teams • Almost every route/cave has at least one "boss" trainer • A few extra, "hidden", trainers, that give stuff. • All Gym Leaders have edited teams • All Gym Leaders have 6 Pokémon in their team • Gary and Giovanni made tougher Tips: • Don't overlook any Pokémon, since it may evolve into something cool • Use evolution stones • Use the fishing rods • Talk to NPC's • Talk to the guy that gives advice in the gyms • Grass below Pallet Town is a grinding place • Explore places to find the secret trainers
